org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.mapping
Class CompassClassMapping

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.mapping.CompassClassMapping

public class CompassClassMapping
extends Object

Describes a Compass searchable class mapping Note: a runtime Compass Mapping API is coming soon, so I'll replace this with that then

Author:
Maurice Nicholson
